instruction.value: Administer dose diluted in 250 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 60 minutes.
Administer dose diluted in 250 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 30 to 60 minutes.

AdditionalNotes.value: Metastatic Breast Cancer. Observe patient for a 60 minute period post-infusion.

Metastatic Breast Cancer. Observe patient for a 30 minute period post-infusion. If the time between infusions is less than 6 weeks, the 420 mg dose may be continued. If the time between infusions is 6 weeks or more, a dose of 840 mg pertuzumab should be re-administered and then subsequent dosing would continue at 420 mg.
